name: Rain Tempo
description:
Rain Tempo is a rhythm game i've been working on for so long, so i decided to share it on itch.io, i hope you guys like it and support it!

The game is free althought donations are welcome, those will be used to improve the game and add more features to it!

If you encounter a bug go to our forum and let me know what is it all about, i am always there!!

NOTE:  The game in its early access stage (more updates to come), you can also join our official discord server for suggestions, stay tuned with the latest updates or chat with me!

Rain Tempo Discord Server
